RMI
Class DBImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              RMI.DBImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, DBAccount, DBCamera, DBCliente, DBExtra, DBPersona
public class DBImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements java.io.Serializable, DBAccount, DBCamera, DBPersona, DBCliente, DBExtra

Questa classe contiene i metodi implementati per il collegamento con il database remoto

Author:
Daniele
See Also:
